amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funding for patent applications for human organisms.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds from being used to issue patents on claims directed to or encompassing a human organism.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weldon (FL) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Weldon (FL).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Weldon (FL) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
